Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Class A, high-rise office building located one block north of the Ventura Freeway adjacent to the Hilton Hotel. The building has an expansive outdoor plaza with seating that features a weekly farmers market.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: 190,000 SF Class A office building Panoramic mountain views
Hip, unique, and modern work environment
LEED Gold Certification – one of Glendale’s greenest office buildings
Highly accessible with direct access to Ventura Freeway and Glendale Beeline

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Three-story office building located walking distance from The Americana, Glendale Galleria and Brand Boulevard with easy driving access to the Glendale (2), Golden State (5) and Ventura (134) Freeways.

address.Common.Line2: 700 North Central Avenue, Glendale, CA, USA

Common.PostalAddresses.Common.Line2: 700 North Central Avenue, Glendale, CA, USA

Common.ActualAddress.Common.Line2: 700 North Central Avenue, Glendale, CA, USA

Common.PostalAddresses.Common.Line2: 700 North Central Avenue, Glendale, CA, USA

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Eight-story, class A office building with direct access to the Ventura (134) Freeway with connection to the Glendale (2) and Golden State (5) Freeways. The building is located within close proximity to restaurants, shopping and entertainment with a WalkScore of 85 (very walkable).

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: Corner suite with Northwest views of Verdugo mountains and Media District.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Expansive 23,000 SF column-free floor plates with impressive views in every direction.
State-of-the-art 100+ person conference center with indoor/outdoor event space for tenants' exclusive use.
Pelotons, showers and locker rooms onsite (Equinox health club 3 minute walk away).
Building-top signage and monument signage available.
Emphasis on green and wellness elements to create a hospitable working environment.
Adjacent to recently constructed luxury multi-family residential units.
Freeway accessible and proximity to an abundance of amenities.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located on the northwest corner of Pioneer and Central immediately off the 134 Freeway. The closest Class A building in Glendale to the Burbank Media District and minutes from the Disney and DreamWorks main campuses.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Premier Class A office building in prime Glendale, immediate freeway access, recently renovated common areas and onsite amenities including state of the art conference center and indoor/outdoor event space, Pelotons and wellness space, lockers/showers, onsite cafe, ample outdoor space, virtual concierge services, secure parking and 24/7 security.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Full Floor and Partial Floor Opportunities in Glendale's Premier Class A High Rise
